content.html: My best parenting hack is parent timeouts. You at your wits end? “Mommy is going in timeout.” Kid knows exactly how much time that is and that there’s no talking when someone’s in timeout. No long explanation. No questions. Undisturbed quiet time. Happy everyone.
content.value:
My best parenting hack is parent timeouts. 

You at your wits end? “Mommy is going in timeout.”

Kid knows exactly how much time that is and that there’s no talking when someone’s in timeout. 

No long explanation. No questions. Undisturbed quiet time. Happy everyone.
